Natural First Aid Kit

    • The Problem

    The Solution

    On the go moms need to be prepared at all times and carrying around a box of first aid items is not always convenient.

    Design an app that offers natural solutions on the go.

    Keeping to natural remedies that can be found on the go was an important consideration.

    Competitive Analysis

    To get a sense of what was already available in the app world, I researched my competition and compared them to my initial key features.



    Affinity Diagram

    To better understand the goals and desires of my target user, I interviewed several people to see what characteristics emerged. A couple of trends were noticeable.

    Persona

    Mary most closely represented the goals shared by most of the users interviewed.

    Sketches & Wireframes

    Because there were a lot of pieces to put together to create a campaign, it was important to keep the construction of the message easy so users wouldn't get lost or forget a step.
